ddf.catalog.filter

Interface XPathBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    XPathBasicBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeotoolsXPathBuilder

    public interface XPathBuilder
extends XPathBasicBuilder
    Builds XPath Filters
    Author:
    Michael Menousek, Lockheed Martin, ddf.isgs@lmco.com

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.opengis.filter.Filter exists()
      Builds a Filter that matches Metacards where the XML node indicated by the XPath exists.
      XPathBasicBuilder is()
      Continue building the Filter with an implied EQUALS

      • Methods inherited from interface ddf.catalog.filter.XPathBasicBuilder

        like

    • Method Detail

      • exists

        org.opengis.filter.Filter exists()
        Builds a Filter that matches Metacards where the XML node indicated by the XPath exists. Searches across all Metacard Attributes of type AttributeType.AttributeFormat.XML.
        Returns:
        Filter for indicated XPath

      • is

        XPathBasicBuilder is()
        Continue building the Filter with an implied EQUALS
        Returns:
        XPathBasicBuilder, to continue building the Filter
